author: Zack Budryk
title: US ambassador to UK: China could have stopped coronavirus by doing 'right things'
description: U.S. Ambassador to the United Kingdom Woody Johnson blamed China for the devastation caused by the coronavirus pandemic, arguing in an...
content:
U.S. Ambassador to the United Kingdom Woody Johnson blamed China for the devastation caused by the coronavirus pandemic, arguing in an op-ed for the British newspaper The Times on Thursday that Beijing suppressed data about its spread.  
China, Johnson wrote… [+2425 chars]
